title: Sacred Heart of Jesus (Chapel of)
body:
In the area of Cardais, in the parish of Água de Pena, Canon Henrique Modesto de Bettencourt had a chapel dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus built in 1907, on land he owned there.

A chapel of this invocation was also founded a few years ago in the parish of Monte by Father Jorge de Faria e Castro.

1907: Construction of the chapel in the area of Cardais
